soc.robot

Class SOCBuildPlanStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.Vector<E>
          • java.util.Stack<SOCPossiblePiece>
            • soc.robot.SOCBuildPlanStack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<SOCPossiblePiece>, java.util.Collection<SOCPossiblePiece>, java.util.List<SOCPossiblePiece>, java.util.RandomAccess, SOCBuildPlan

    public class SOCBuildPlanStack
extends java.util.Stack<SOCPossiblePiece>
implements SOCBuildPlan, java.io.Serializable
    Stack implementation of a SOCBuildPlan.

    Uses stack directly to save time - will need to change to a wrapper if we ever change SOCBuildPlan to an abstract class instead of an interface.

    Since:
    2.4.50
    Author:
    kho30
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
